svcsection.title: Hydraulic Anti-Lock Braking System (HABS) Installation Guide for OEMs and Body Builders (Includes Body Builder Installation Information)

geninfo.para: This guide addresses frequently asked questions regarding Meritor WABCO D Version Hydraulic ABS components and installation procedures for trucks, buses, and motor home chassis. It also includes information for body builders who are modifying or altering vehicle chassis equipped with Meritor WABCO Hydraulic ABS. Examples of typical hydraulic ABS installations appear in Figure 2 and Figure 3 of this bulletin.

This publication is to be used as an OEM installation reference guide only. If service or maintenance is required on Hydraulic ABS and related components, follow the complete instructions and procedures found in Maintenance Manual 39, Hydraulic ABS for Medium-Duty Trucks, Buses and Motor Home Chassis.
